text: And read/recite on them Noah`s information/news, when he said to his nation: "You (my) nation, if my place/position and my reminding/mentioning with Gods` evidences/verses had become a burden on you, so on God I relied/depended , so gather/collect/unify your matter/affair and your partners (with God), then your matter/affair be not on you ambiguous/vague (covert) , then pass judgment/order to me, and do not give me time/delay me
